docs.snippet: ASSOR--Evelyn. The partners, attorneys and staff of Golenbock Eiseman Assor Bell & Peskoe LLP acknowledge with great sorrow the passing of Evelyn Assor on April 4, 2014, the beloved mother of our founding partner, Nathan Assor. We extend our heart...
docs.lead_paragraph: ASSOR--Evelyn. The partners, attorneys and staff of Golenbock Eiseman Assor Bell & Peskoe LLP acknowledge with great sorrow the passing of Evelyn Assor on April 4, 2014, the beloved mother of our founding partner, Nathan Assor. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Nathan, his wife Marcia and to grandsons, Isaac and Benjamin, and his wife Jamie and great-granddaughter, Natalie. She will be profoundly missed by all of them and by her devoted sister, Debra Unowitz. Graveside service 11am, April 6 at Sharon Gardens Cemetery, Valhalla, NY.
